title: Debonair Vi and Ezreal have arrived

replies.body:
I see a lot of people demanding skins for so and so and it really irritates me... So I'm gonna go ahead and explain briefly why the masses shouldn't get so upset if their favorite champ doesn't get a skin.

{{champion:201}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:157}}  Are very new to the roster... Give them some time and be patient...

{{champion:154}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:121}}  and even {{champion:222}}  Seem to have more complex rigs and animations, therefore would require tons more effort and bug-testing to get a skin to look good and play well. And if they did, they would likely be more expensive. Anyone with any sort of knowledge of game design, animation, and rigging could see that... I don't even play Kha'Zix and I see it.

Some champs like {{champion:99}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:81}}  and {{champion:76}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:19}}  Have simple designs that can be categorized in one of two ways: Humanoid or Animal-shaped... Its a little easier to think of and design skins for these champs cause it could be as simple as a change of clothes or subspecies (Like Safari {{champion:51}}  or Tundra {{champion:19}} ) But that is much more of a difficult process if the champion doesn't fall into those specific groups as easily as the others like {{champion:161}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:31}} ...They're designs are so different that the process for champs like these will end up being a bit slower and more difficult

**TL;DR** Quit pitching a fit about every skin release that you think someone else needed more.... You are not the Riot Skin team.... Get over it

P.S. Riot, I love the new skins, They look incredible. Keep up the good work! ^_^

Not to mention {{champion:121}} has an evolving model, there are 24 different combinations of evolutions that need to be created to make a skin, not to mention the complexity of the rig. Really makes me appreciate Mecha {{champion:121}} only being 1350.
Exactly... My entire second point was mostly directed at {{champion:121}}  and the evolving nature of his model and rig... I'm glad I'm not the only one that thinks like this ^_^
Jurassic Kha'zix...plz
Why? With his current kit/damage {{champion:121}} already belongs in a museum. {{champion:81}}
THAT JOKE BELONGS IN A MUSEUM!
more true words have never been said in the history of LoL
As I {{summoner:4}} to sign in to up vote this post the recapcha that Riot uses look suspiciously like a picture of my house numbers...creepy.
Completely agree with you. Riot skin teams work insanely hard trying to amuse us and release new **GOOD** skins as fast as possible. Give them time, unlike Vel'Koz, they only have 2 arms per person.
I love the constant complaining when new skins get released. It shows that the community isn't appreciative of anything whatsoever. Keep up the good work, Riot.
{{champion:33}} ok.....
I agree 100%. Riot has other things to work on, and two decent, cheap skins are really nothing to complain about.
Agreed. With over 100 champs, it's rare that the 25~ I play consistently get a new skin. I don't whine though. I type long-winded posts about how much better I am than the whiners. Join me!
Who's the person behind Ezreal?
Taric
{{champion:44}} {{item:1058}}
[Insert Dirty Joke here]
{{champion:44}} "Insert what?"
Amazing how there were complaints about there being no 750 skins and then when two finally come out everyone just wants to gripe more. Community plz.

Up until now, male champs have been getting Debonair skins and female champs have gotten Heartseeker skins, but it looks like Vi breaks barriers just as easily as she breaks vaults. Any comments Riot? And is there any chance we'll see a Heartseeker skin on one of the guys?

{{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:44}} :D
heartseeker{{champion:6}}  rito <3
there needs to be heart seeker {{champion:110}}  XD and heart seeker {{champion:133}}
Does Heartseeker just have to be a marksman thing?
heart seeker {{champion:79}}
This freaking community loves to complain about everything. Sorry Rito {{item:3070}}
Honestly both of these skins are pretty trash.
Ezreal really didn't need a new skin, how about {{champion:60}} or {{champion:157}} ?

I say Zed
MORE ZED
What about {{champion:7}} ? All her skins are trash, she needs some love :(
Eve's skins look awful. But I'd like the dunkmaster Darius to come out, or a new Kha'Zix skin. I also agree with Elise. Others that would be cool would be Trundle, Riven, or Wukung.
What about Kha'Zix? Am I the only one that noticed he hasn't gotten one?
kha is most likely getting the ultimate skin
It's funny how these skins would've been amazing if they were released in Season 1. All these new skins have spoiled this new community.
totally agree; {{champion:254}} they {{champion:81}} already have way better skins lol :))
That's exactly why these skins are 750 tier... They aren't supposed to be better.
one of {{champion:81}}'s skins is already one of the most expensive just under udyr's skin
Pulsefire Ezreal is the same price as Spirit Guard Udyr.
agreed like shamps with like 2 or less skins need more such as {{champion:201}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:154}} or{{champion:161}}
But {{champion:238}}  just got SKT skin...
stop trolling with ur 250rp icon 1500ip it should be. stop being money horees

Yes, they are money whores* because they give us a game completely free and that you don't have to spend any money whatsoever on if you dont want...Saying they are money whores shows how little you know about business.
In the splash, Vi's rose is on her left, while in game, it's on the right.
Warring Kindoms {{champion:157}} anybody? yea? no?
Hell yeah. We need some Zhao Tai up in here.
No Debonair ward skin? RIOT how could you D:
Just imagine a ward wearing a tuxedo!
people say these skins are not great. but they still buy it anyway :p
It's time to assemble all the fancy people now! {{champion:31}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:254}} But {{champion:126}} will be excluded.
U have a choice to buy or not stop complaining and appreciate the art and time they put into these skins. #growup
